sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Closing the gender gap in innovation and technology is the focus of the 67th session of the Commission on the Status of Women, which opened at UN headquarters in New York on Monday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Digital technologies have the potential to accelerate progress towards the SDGs by enabling the creation of new opportunities for education, health, agriculture and entrepreneurship among others.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: If we do not have data on women and if the algorithms are mainly designed by men, the risk is that new technologies will make our world even more unequal.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Over the next two weeks, participants from around the world will examine how gender equality can be achieved in the digital era and work to promote greater inclusivity for women in science, technology, engineering and maths.

sentences.sentence: and the order has been issued to send reinforcements to this area the Institute for the study of war says Bakhmut is not intrinsically significant operationally or strategically taking the city is necessary but not sufficient for further Russian advances in Donetsk region and Russian forces have already taken such heavy losses fighting for the city that their attack will very likely culminate after they have secured it if not before.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Now the loss of Bakhmut is not therefore of major operational or strategic concern to Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: But Ukraine's fight for Bakhmut has become strategically significant because of the current composition of Russian forces arrayed in the area. The opportunity to damage the Wagner Group elite elements along with other elite units if they are committed in a defensive urban warfare setting where the attrition gradient strongly favors Ukraine is an attractive one, the Institute for the Study of War says. Now some Western reports have recently suggested that Ukraine is expanding its own elite manpower and scarce equipment on mainly Wagner group prison recruits who are mere cannon footer. The Institute for the Study of War says that observation is valid in general although the pool of Russian convict recruits suitable for combat is not limitless and the permanent elimination of tens of thousands of them in Bakhmut means that they will not be available for more important fights now the UK Defense Ministry assesses that Russian military command is failing to properly equip its forces despite close combat engagements in Ukraine according to its recent intelligence update, Russian military command is ordering mobilized reservists to assault Ukrainian concrete positions with only firearms and shovels. The Battle of Bakhmut may in fact severely degrade the Wagner Group's best forces, depriving Russia of some of its most effective and most difficult to replace shock troops.
